title: Microsoft Teams: Together Mode Usability Improvements
description:
We are bringing new usability improvements to Together
Mode. Participants in Together Mode will now have name labels attached to their
videos. Name labels will also support status icons that indicate microphone,
active speaker, spotlight or pin within the meeting. Second, your own video in
the gallery will now be removed while Together Mode is active to avoid
duplication of the self preview. Lastly, Together Mode will now display raised
hands and reactions within the view.
